title: Old School Ties
description: Tracey Mortimer is 33, stuck in a dull marriage that's only tolerable because her husband is rarely at home; and her days with two children are a never-ending round of kids' TV and alphabetti spaghetti. It's a long way from being the Most Popular Girl in the School ...So when a TV company decides to make a reality-style show on a perfect school reunion it could be Tracey's chance to re-live the good old days. But not all her ex-classmates remember their school days in quite the same way. Tracey made Suzanne Sharp's life hell - so what better way to get her own back than revenge live on national television ...
author: Kate Harrison
